alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 18 at 5:20AM AKDT until March 21 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions are possible starting late Sunday night at St Lawrence Island and spreading to the Bering Strait by early Sunday. The blizzard is expected to continue into Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
